Typealiases.html#/s:8KeyprApi0A12JWTGene.name: KeyprJWTGenerator
Typealiases.html#/s:8KeyprApi0A12JWTGene.abstract: A function responsible for generating a jwt and using the callback to notify main caller.

Typealiases.html#/s:8KeyprApi18WebTokenC.name: WebTokenCompletion
Typealiases.html#/s:8KeyprApi18WebTokenC.abstract: A callback that either runs a webtoken or error

Enums/ApiError.html#/s:8KeyprApi0B5Error.name: errorDescription
Enums/ApiError.html#/s:8KeyprApi0B5Error.abstract: A description of the server error that occurred.

Enums/JWTError.html.name: JWTError
Enums/JWTError.html.abstract: Errors that can occur for a JSON Web Token (JWT)

Enums/KeyprAsyncTask.html.name: KeyprAsyncTask
Enums/KeyprAsyncTask.html.abstract: Different types on async tasks in Keypr

Enums/ApiError.html.name: ApiError
Enums/ApiError.html.abstract: A error that can occur with calling keypr api.

Classes/ReservationTask/Attributes.html#.name: status
Classes/ReservationTask/Attributes.html#.abstract: The status of the task PENDING, SUCCESS, FAILURE

Classes/ReservationTask/Attributes.html#.name: result
Classes/ReservationTask/Attributes.html#.abstract: The result of the task (only seen this on a FAILURE).

Classes/ReservationTask/Attributes.html#.name: ready
Classes/ReservationTask/Attributes.html#.abstract: Whether or not the task has completed.

Classes/ReservationTask/Attributes.html#.name: statusUrl
Classes/ReservationTask/Attributes.html#.abstract: A url to check the status of a task.

Classes/ReservationTask.html#/s:8KeyprAp.name: id
Classes/ReservationTask.html#/s:8KeyprAp.abstract: The task identifier, usual to check the status of the task again.

Classes/ReservationTask.html#/s:8KeyprAp.name: type
Classes/ReservationTask.html#/s:8KeyprAp.abstract: The type of task, reservation, task_status is what I have seen.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes/MetaField.name: eCheckOutEnabled
Classes/Reservation/Attributes/MetaField.abstract: Whether electronic checkout is enabled for a reservation.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes/MetaField.name: eCheckInEnabled
Classes/Reservation/Attributes/MetaField.abstract: Whether electronic checkin is enabled for a reservation.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: externalId
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: ID used by external system (usually Property Management System)

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: lastName
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: The last (family) name / surname of the guest

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: postalCode
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: The postal code / zipcode of the guest

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: checkInOAuthAppId
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: The OAuth application responsible for checking the guest in.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: checkInSourceType
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: The source responsible for checking the guest in. (mobile,pms) seen so far.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: checkOutOAuthAppId
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: The OAuth application responsible for checking the guest out.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: checkOutSourceType
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: The source responsible for checking the guest out. (mobile,pms) seen so far.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: metaFields
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: Metadata on the attributes of the reservation.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: modifiedAt
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: The date the last modification of the reservation occurred.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.name: externalModifiedDate
Classes/Reservation/Attributes.html#/s:8.abstract: The date the last external modification of the reservation occurred.

Classes/Reservation/Attributes/MetaField.name: MetaFields
Classes/Reservation/Attributes/MetaField.abstract: Metadata on the attributes of a reservation to see

Classes/Reservation/State.html#/s:8Keypr.name: pending
Classes/Reservation/State.html#/s:8Keypr.abstract: Temporary state that indicates a newly created data record

Classes/Reservation/State.html#/s:8Keypr.name: checkedIn
Classes/Reservation/State.html#/s:8Keypr.abstract: Guest has checked in, current time should be between checkin_date and checkout_date

Classes/Reservation/State.html#/s:8Keypr.name: checkedOut
Classes/Reservation/State.html#/s:8Keypr.abstract: Guest checked out today, state will be set to archived next day

Classes/Reservation/State.html#/s:8Keypr.name: canceled
Classes/Reservation/State.html#/s:8Keypr.abstract: Indicates that reservation was canceled or guest did not show up

Classes/Reservation/Metadata.html#/s:8Ke.name: canCheckIn
Classes/Reservation/Metadata.html#/s:8Ke.abstract: Indicates if remote check-in operation can be attempted. When this field is set to false, controls allowing to submit a check-in request should be hidden or disabled.

Classes/Reservation/Metadata.html#/s:8Ke.name: canCheckOut
Classes/Reservation/Metadata.html#/s:8Ke.abstract: Indicates if remote check-out operation can be attempted. When this field is set to false, controls allowing to submit a check-out request should be hidden or disabled.

Classes/Reservation.html#/s:8KeyprApi11R.name: type
Classes/Reservation.html#/s:8KeyprApi11R.abstract: The type of reservation. Currently only one type reservation.

Classes/Reservation.html#/s:8KeyprApi11R.name: meta
Classes/Reservation.html#/s:8KeyprApi11R.abstract: Metadata regarding this reservation, that can be helpful implementing user flows in an API client.

Classes/Reservation/State.html.name: State
Classes/Reservation/State.html.abstract: The states a reservation can be in.

Classes/PagedResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.name: data
Classes/PagedResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.abstract: The data that this page holds normally a list of some json object.

Classes/OAuthResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.name: expiresIn
Classes/OAuthResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.abstract: How many seconds from now the access token will expire.

Classes/OAuthResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.name: scope
Classes/OAuthResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.abstract: The value of the scope parameter is expressed as a list of space-

Classes/OAuthResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.name: refreshToken
Classes/OAuthResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.abstract: A refresh token that can be used to get another access token.

Classes/OAuthResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.name: idToken
Classes/OAuthResponse.html#/s:8KeyprApi1.abstract: The id token is a JSON Web Token (JWT) that contains user profile information

Classes/ErrorObjectResponse.html#/s:8Key.name: errors
Classes/ErrorObjectResponse.html#/s:8Key.abstract: List of one or more errors that occurred.

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC12j.name: jwtGenerator
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC12j.abstract: A func that is responsible for generating JWT.

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC3jw.name: jwt
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC3jw.abstract: A JSON Web Token (JWT) since is used to get a access token.

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC12j.name: init(jwtGenerator:environment:)
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC12j.abstract: Creates a new instance for accessing KEYPR Api using Federated Authentication Flow.

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC12j.name: init(jwtGenerator:sessionConfig:environment:)
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC12j.abstract: Creates a new instance for accessing KEYPR Api using Federated Authentication Flow.

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC5st.name: start(task:reservationId:completionHandler:)
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC5st.abstract: Starts an async task aka check-in/check-out. Must use check() to know if it completes. or use perform()

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC5ch.name: check(taskId:completionHandler:)
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC5ch.abstract: Check the status of a check-in/check-out task.

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC12r.name: reservations(query:completionHandler:)
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC12r.abstract: Get reservations for the logged in user.

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC14g.name: getAccessToken(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC14g.abstract: Get access token from JWT (JSON Web Token).

Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC18c.name: checkAuthorization(jwtComplete:accessTokenCompletion:)
Classes/KeyprApi.html#/s:8KeyprApiAAC18c.abstract: Check Authorization, gets and sets access_token and calls JWT generator if needed.

Classes/WebToken.html#/s:8KeyprApi8WebTo.name: expiration
Classes/WebToken.html#/s:8KeyprApi8WebTo.abstract: The expiration date of the token in UTC.

Classes/WebToken.html#/s:8KeyprApi8WebTo.name: expires(in:)
Classes/WebToken.html#/s:8KeyprApi8WebTo.abstract: Set expiration based off seconds from current time.

Classes/WebToken.html#/s:8KeyprApi8WebTo.name: isValid()
Classes/WebToken.html#/s:8KeyprApi8WebTo.abstract: Whether the token is valid. meaning is not expired and has a value.

Classes/WebToken.html#/s:8KeyprApi8WebTo.name: fill(jwt:)
Classes/WebToken.html#/s:8KeyprApi8WebTo.abstract: Use JWT to set both expiration and token value.

Classes/WebToken.html.name: WebToken
Classes/WebToken.html.abstract: A web token that has a string representation, and can expire.

Classes/KeyprApi.html.name: KeyprApi
Classes/KeyprApi.html.abstract: Used to execute functions on keypr api as a user, using Federated Authentication Flow.

Classes/ErrorResponse.html.name: ErrorResponse
Classes/ErrorResponse.html.abstract: A json error response that is defined by keypr server.

Classes/ErrorObjectResponse.html.name: ErrorObjectResponse
Classes/ErrorObjectResponse.html.abstract: A json error response that is defined by keypr server.

Classes/OAuthResponse.html.name: OAuthResponse
Classes/OAuthResponse.html.abstract: A json response gotten from a successful OAuth request.

Classes/PagedResponse.html.name: PagedResponse
Classes/PagedResponse.html.abstract: A paged json response from keypr server.

Classes/ReservationTask.html.name: ReservationTask
Classes/ReservationTask.html.abstract: A async task that was start or performed on a reservation

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
